ygData.msgSnippet: hehe guess we should of read your whole message!  Sorry about that. Try www.lview.com its a good image viewer and it is was i use to convert the .bmp
ygData.messageBody:
hehe guess we should of read your whole message! Sorry about that.

Try www.lview.com its a good image viewer and it is was i use to convert the .bmp screenshots into small jpegs.

Grah - Level 27 Cleric of Xegony

From: The Scotts

Sent: Sunday, July 11, 1999 7:52 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Need the site pls


Umm heres the things guys i know about Eq's screenshot but they are so huge it takes forever to download to someone if someone would like to take some time to explain how to turn a bmp into a jpeg (i tried to do it thru paint eheh teh only thing i ahve and i couldn't save it as a jpeg anyone wanty to help:) I know there are some computer wizzes out there:)

-----Original Message-----
From: Mystik <mystik@...>
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Sunday, July 11, 1999 4:16 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Need the site pls


when you take shots in EQ, they will appear as bmp files in your EverQuest dtoirectory, and you can open em like that and save them as whatever file format you want...i use paintshop pro 5, but anything that can read bmp and change em to jpeg will work (:
The Scotts wrote:

Okay guys I need a program a free one:)(preferabaly) that i can use to take screen shots in EQ with I downloaded UOSU a while ago and when i trie to take a screen shot i get an error message and a blasck screen. So if someone know a program ansd site(unless you have ICQ then you can just download the zipped program to me) or how to change the EQ's pics (using the "-") to jpeg for pls let em knwo alos thanks erveryone!
